item.title: By: PerryM
item.dc:creator: PerryM
item.description:
The poor are poor at wealth accumulation and just about anything in life - they are life's losers. Lazy, stupid, insane, whatever at wealth accumulation.
The rich are genius at accumulating wealth; they are the risk-takers, the folks who risk it all for gain - many fail but a few make it big.
The 1% are the folks who determine how a society develop - they drive a society to excellence.
So suck it up you who are poor and be glad the rich exist......because you suck at it..........

item.title: By: Terry Ray Anderson
item.dc:creator: Terry Ray Anderson
item.description: I think the thing LSD taught me when I was in my teens and twenties is that our perceptions of what we think we see and believe should always bear close scrutiny; I'm surprised how many people look at something from only one side and then claim to know the entirety of it.
